name: capture_region_for_task
title: Capture region screenshot
description: Grab a focused region screenshot to inspect a specific UI area.

arguments.name: region
arguments.description: Region string x,y,width,height to focus on

arguments.name: output_path
arguments.description: Optional custom path for the region screenshot

content.text: Goal: {{goal}}. Validate region '{{region}}' uses x,y,width,height with positive width/height; if invalid, fall back to full-screen capture and mention the fallback. Call `take_screenshot` with that region and output_path={{output_path}} when provided. Return file_path, sizes, scaling_factor/warnings, and a short summary of what is visible in that region.
